articles.title: Meet JUICE, The First Spacecraft To Orbit A Planet-Sized Icy Moon On A Hunt For Alien Oceans - Forbes
articles.description: The European Space Agency’s JUpiter ICy moons Explorer (JUICE) mission is scheduled to launch in 2023 and arrive in the Jovian System in 2030.
articles.content:
The European Space Agency's Jupiter Icy Moons Explorer (JUICE) will study Jupiter and its icy moons.

articles.title: ECG can pinpoint hospitalized COVID-19 patients at high risk of mortality - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: A simple electrocardiogram (ECG) can pinpoint hospitalized COVID-19 patients at high risk of death who might need intensive management. That's the finding of a study presented at EHRA 2022, a scientific congress of the European Society of Cardiology.

articles.title: Miners nudge ASX closer to record high - news.com.au
articles.description: The Australian sharemarket on Monday moved within 100 points of its all-time high as the miners once again enjoyed the benefits of a commodity cycle supercharged by conflict in Eastern Europe.
